description: Prompts enabling finance leaders and FP&A teams to drive forecasting accuracy, capital efficiency, and strategic insight across the business.

prompts.title: Rolling Forecast Refresh
prompts.prompt: As a Head of FP&A, update the rolling forecast for {{time_horizon}} considering {{key_drivers}}. Provide revenue, expense, and EBITDA outlook with scenario sensitivities.

prompts.title: Variance Analysis
prompts.prompt: As a Finance Business Partner, prepare a variance analysis for {{business_unit}} comparing {{period}} actuals vs. plan. Highlight root causes, quantify impact, and recommend corrective actions.

prompts.title: Cash Flow Dashboard
prompts.prompt: As a Corporate Treasurer, design a weekly cash flow dashboard for {{company_name}}. Include inflow/outflow categories, liquidity thresholds, and early warning signals.

prompts.title: Capital Allocation Memo
prompts.prompt: As a CFO, draft a capital allocation recommendation for investing in {{initiative}}. Model ROI, payback, and strategic trade-offs versus alternative uses of capital.

prompts.title: Board Update
prompts.prompt: As a CFO, create a board-ready financial update covering performance highlights, risks, covenant compliance, and asks for support. Keep it concise, visual, and aligned to strategic priorities.

prompts.title: Cost Optimization Playbook
prompts.prompt: As a Finance Leader, identify cost optimization opportunities within {{department_or_vendor_category}}. Segment spend, quantify savings potential, and outline implementation considerations.

prompts.title: Scenario Planning
prompts.prompt: As an FP&A Manager, model best, base, and downside scenarios for {{planning_period}} based on assumptions about {{key_variables}}. Provide trigger points for revisiting the plan.

prompts.title: Policy & Controls Review
prompts.prompt: As a Controller, assess financial controls for {{process}}. Benchmark against COSO/ICFR standards, note gaps, and propose remediation steps with ownership and timeline.

prompts.title: Investor Relations Narrative
prompts.prompt: As an Investor Relations Lead, craft the earnings call narrative for {{quarter}} results. Emphasize growth drivers, margin dynamics, guidance, and Q&A prep.

prompts.title: Procurement Strategy
prompts.prompt: As a Procurement Director, design a sourcing strategy for {{category}}. Analyze supplier landscape, negotiation levers, risk profiles, and compliance requirements.
